divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Traynor Ave in Kitchener when I spotted it in the sky directly in front of me. I pulled into the church parking lot to park and get out for a better view. There were 3 people there looking in the sky as well at the object. At first I thought it may have been a plane on fire or something because it looked kinda like fire but it was randomly pulsating and flashing and at times disappeared for a split second and reappeared in a different spot a little higher. There were no clouds in the sky, or airplanes that I could see. It was a beautiful evening 20 c. There was no noise... The object disappeared.
Summary: Strange glowing fiery red light Multiple witnesses. Observed for approximately 10 minutes.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Kitchener
There were no other sightings in Kitchener on or around October 8th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
